name: Astral Tournament (itch) (CjacquelineC)
description:
Premise

After the deaths of all of your friends, you host an space race in their honor. As you sit inside of your spaceship, you are reminded of the good times you used to have with your friends. This time, you must race across the galaxy alone.

Controls 

W - Moving forwards

A - Turning left

S - Moving backwards

D - Turning right

Space - Use fuel item (Gives the ship a speed boost forwards)

F - Use clock item (Adds time to the clock)

Left Shift - Use health item (Adds one heart to the health stat)

Esc - Quit game

Things To Do

The goal of the game is to race to the finish line at the end of the level before the time runs out. The player must navigate their surroundings and avoid obstacles such as bouncy planets, nebulas, black holes, and asteroids. They can also use worm holes to move them faster ahead. The players can collect power-ups that aid them in their journey.
